trans-unit.source: A behavior that adds a workflow control endpoint with a fixed configuration to the service host.
trans-unit.target: 這個行為會將具有固定組態工作流程控制端點加入至服務主機。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowInstanceManagementBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowInstanceManagementBehavior"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters*> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters*>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters*>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: The service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 服務端點。

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters.
trans-unit.target: 繫結參數。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior*> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior*>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: The fixed workflow control relative endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 固定的工作流程控制相對端點位址。

trans-unit.source: This address is appended to the base address of the service to create the control endpoint address.
trans-unit.target: 這個位址會附加至服務來建立控制端點位址的基底位址。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding for the workflow instance control endpoint when the HTTP protocol is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 HTTP 通訊協定時，取得工作流程執行個體控制端點的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The binding is automatically created based on the protocols configured for the service host’s base address.
trans-unit.target: 繫結會自動根據建立服務主機的基底位址所設定的通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Messages sent to the workflow instance control endpoint do not contain any personally identifiable information and therefore it need not be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至工作流程執行個體控制端點的訊息不包含任何個人識別資訊，因此它必須不會加密。

trans-unit.source: Messages sent to the workflow control endpoint need to contain the user identity to use for authorization.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至工作流程控制端點的訊息需包含用於授權的使用者識別。

trans-unit.source: When the HTTP protocol is enabled, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> is used with the following settings.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 HTTP 通訊協定時，<xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>會搭配下列設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>

trans-unit.source: Transaction flow is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 啟用交易流程。

trans-unit.source: Security mode is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: 安全性模式設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.SecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Windows client credentials are used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 用戶端認證。

trans-unit.source: The binding for the workflow instance control endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體控制端點繫結。

trans-unit.source: Gets the binding for the workflow instance control endpoint when the net.pipe protocol is used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 net.pipe 通訊協定時，取得工作流程執行個體控制端點的繫結。

trans-unit.source: The binding is automatically created based on the protocols configured for the service host’s base address.
trans-unit.target: 繫結會自動根據建立服務主機的基底位址所設定的通訊協定。

trans-unit.source: Messages sent to the workflow instance control endpoint do not contain any personally identifiable information and therefore it need not be encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至工作流程執行個體控制端點的訊息不包含任何個人識別資訊，因此它必須不會加密。

trans-unit.source: Messages sent to the workflow control endpoint need to contain the user identity to use for authorization.
trans-unit.target: 傳送至工作流程控制端點的訊息需包含用於授權的使用者識別。

trans-unit.source: When the net.pipe protocol is enabled, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding> is used with the following settings.
trans-unit.target: 啟用 net.pipe 通訊協定時，<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>會搭配下列設定。</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeBinding>

trans-unit.source: Transaction flow is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 啟用交易流程。

trans-unit.source: Security mode is set to <xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode>.
trans-unit.target: 安全性模式設定為<xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.NetNamedPipeSecurityMode>

trans-unit.source: Transport security level is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸安全性層級設為<xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>.</xref:System.Net.Security.ProtectionLevel>

trans-unit.source: Windows client credentials are used.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Windows 用戶端認證。

trans-unit.source: The binding for the workflow instance control endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 工作流程執行個體控制端點繫結。

trans-unit.source: An implementation of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate*> method.
trans-unit.target: 實作<xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate*>方法。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate*>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: 服務描述。

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: 服務主機。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Windows group of users authorized to use the workflow instance control endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用者獲授權使用工作流程執行個體控制端點的 Windows 群組。

trans-unit.source: Defaults to “BUILTIN\Administrators”.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為"BUILTIN\Administrators"。

trans-unit.source: Valid settings are: a local Windows group or a Windows domain.
trans-unit.target: 有效的設定為︰ 本機 Windows 群組或 Windows 網域。

trans-unit.source: The Windows group of users authorized to use the workflow instance control endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Windows 授權使用工作流程執行個體控制端點的使用者群組。
